Package src.gui

package src.gui
Provides the graphical user interface components for the Battleship game.

A user friendly GUI that allows the user to:

  • play against a Bot with 3 difficulty settings
  • setup a multiplayer game
  • connect to a multiplayer game
  • view how to play the game via the game instructions menu
  • change the color theme of the game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Battlescreen
    Battlescreen, where two players shoot at each others' ships
    EndGameDialog
     
    Game_instructions
    Screen where the user can read the game instructions and learn about shortcuts.
    Gamescreen
    Gamescreen, where the previously selcted user ships are being placed on the game board
    Hostscreen
    Screen in multiplayer mode, where you can choose as a host to start a new game or load an old game.
    Joinscreen
    Screen in multiplayer mode, where the player can join a game by entering the appropriate IP address.
    Joinwaitscreen
    Screen, where the player is waiting for the host to start a game.
    Mainframe
    Main window, which contains every screen of the game
    Multiplayer
    Screen in Multiplayer mode, where you can decide whether to join a game or host a game
    Pregamescreen
    Screen for adjusting game settings in multiplayer mode.
    Pregamescreen2
    Screen for adjusting game settings in singleplayer mode.
    QuitConfirmDialog
    Pop-up dialog, when the user is trying to exit the game
    RoundButton
    A customized version of the JButton.
    RoundSpinner
    Modern JSpinner in glass design with rounded corners.
    RoundTextField
    Customized version of the JTextField.
    SaveGameDialog
    Pop-up dialog, when user saves the game
    Settingsscreen
    Screen where the user can change the settings.
    Singleplayer
    Screen in singleplayer mode, where you can load a game or create a new one.
    SquareGridPanel
     
    Titlescreen
    Player can choose between single player and multiplayer.
    Waitingscreen
    Screen in multiplayer mode, where the player is waiting for the joining player.
